#summary Instructions for building JebGL from the source code.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Building JebGL =
== Get the source ==
Get the latest code
{{{
svn checkout http://jebgl.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jebgl-read-only
}}}
or a release (e.g. 0.1)
{{{
svn checkout http://jebgl.googlecode.com/svn/releases/0.1/ jebgl-read-only
}}}

== Get necessary JOGL jars ==
You need the following jars from the JOGL project:
  * `jogl.all.jar`
  * `nativewindow.all.jar`
  * `gluegen-rt.jar`

Put them in a directory called `webstart` inside your newly created `jebgl-read-only` directory

== Build ==
Open a terminal and call
{{{
make
}}}
in the `jebgl-read-only` directory. This should build a jar file called `jebgl.jar`
